title: Media Exchange
author: Opentrons
process:
Choose the size plate you are using and set up the deck as the image is shown.
Download protocol and upload to OT app
Calibrate the containers to be used
Run the protocol and watch your robot do the rest!

markdown.title: Media Exchange
markdown.author: [Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)
markdown.process:
1. Choose the size plate you are using and set up the deck as the image is shown.
2. Download protocol and upload to OT app
3. Calibrate the containers to be used
4. Run the protocol and watch your robot do the rest!
